# SPECIFYING PARSER
#LETTER	NAME	ENABLED	REFONLY	NROLES	MASTER	DESCRIPTION
a	aa	on	FALSE	0		aa
b	bb	off	FALSE	0		bb
c	a_b_c	on	FALSE	0		a b c
# PICKING PARSER with grep
#PARSER	LETTER	NAME	ENABLED	REFONLY	NROLES	MASTER	DESCRIPTION
foo	a	aa	on	FALSE	0		aa
foo	b	bb	off	FALSE	0		bb
foo	c	a_b_c	on	FALSE	0		a b c
